snippet: At the end of a conference in Moscow, the group promised: “We will refrain from competitive devaluation. We will not target our exchange rates for competitive purposes.”
abstract: Group of 20 finance ministers, in concerted move to quiet fears of a so-called currency war, express commitment to let market exchange rates determine the value of their currencies.
lead_paragraph: At the end of a conference in Moscow, the group promised: “We will refrain from competitive devaluation. We will not target our exchange rates for competitive purposes.”

headline.seo: Group of 20 Pledges to Let Markets Set Currency Values
headline.main: Group of 20 Vows to Let Markets Set Currency Values
headline.print_headline: Group of 20 Vows to Let Markets Set Currency Values
